text: Sleuth is a 1972 British American mystery thriller movie directed by Joseph L. Mankiewicz and was based on the 1970 play of the same name by Anthony Shaffer. It stars Michael Caine, Laurence Olivier and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. It was nominated for 4 Academy Awards in 1973 and was remade in 2007. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1972 thriller movies Category:1972 mystery movies Category:British mystery movies Category:British thriller movies Category:American mystery movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Joseph L.
